instruction.value: Administer over 2 hours diluted in 1000 mL D5W.
for 3 days. Administer dose over 1 to 2 hours diluted in 250 mL 0.9% sodium chloride.
for 3 days. Administer dose over 1 hour diluted in 250 mL 0.9% sodium chloride.
for 5 days. Administer dose over 1 hour.
for 3 days. Administer dose over 1 hour diluted in 250 mL D5W.

additionalnotes.value: Hodgkin's Lymphoma. For doses less than or equal to 1500mg, dilute dose in 500 mL 0.9% sodium chloride and administer over 1 hour. For doses greater than 1500 mg, dilute dose in 1000 mL 0.9% sodium chloride and administer over 1.5 to 2 hours.

Metastatic Melanoma. For doses less than or equal to 1500mg, dilute dose in 500 mL 0.9% sodium chloride and administer over 1 hour. For doses greater than 1500 mg, dilute dose in 1000 mL 0.9% sodium chloride and administer over 1.5 to 2 hours.
Melanoma. For doses less than or equal to 1500mg, dilute dose in 500 mL D5W. For doses greater than 1500 mg, dilute dose in 1000 mL D5W.

Pheochromocytoma/Paraganglioma. For doses less than or equal to 1500mg, dilute dose in 500 mL D5W and administer dose over 1 to 1.5 hours. For doses greater than 1500 mg, dilute dose in 1000 mL D5W and administer dose over 1.5 to 2 hours.
